tests.prompt: Add a Character to gamectx registry. Call GetCombatant(ctx, id) and verify it returns the character and no error. Call GetCombatant with unknown ID and verify it returns an error.
Create a Character with 20 HP. Call ApplyDamage with 8 damage. Verify HP is now 12 and DroppedToZero is false.
Create a Character with 10 HP. Call ApplyDamage with 15 damage. Verify HP is 0 (not negative) and DroppedToZero is true.
Create a Combatant with 20 HP. Call combat.DealDamage with 8 slashing damage. Verify combatant HP is now 12.
Subscribe to DamageReceivedEvent. Call combat.DealDamage. Verify DamageReceivedEvent was received with correct TotalDamage and TargetID.
Subscribe to DamageChain at features stage. When event fires, add +2 to damage. Call DealDamage with 8 base damage. Verify final damage applied is 10.
Activate rage on barbarian (resistance to B/P/S). Call DealDamage with 10 slashing damage. Verify final damage applied is 5 (halved).
